output.sentences: It was a snowy day in the city and Bill had to get to work.
Sadly, Bills car was buried underneath a big pile of snow!
Bill looked around wondering where all the snow had come from and noticed above him a snow covered tree.
Bills friends noticed he was stuck and came over to lend a hand.
It took all day but, eventually the car was freed!
